University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign

At this time, there is no known single place where a summary of the latest COVID-19-related activities can be found. Will update here if/when such a resource becomes available.

Some activities:

  • Medical devices / personal protection devices
    1. Illinois RapidVent: Emergency ventillator
  • Contact tracing
  • Computing resources
    1. COVID-19 HPC Consortium: participation by XSEDE, NCSA.
    2. COVID-19 Open Science Grid: OSG participates in above consortium and also the WLCG COVID-19 Task Force.
